errors.generic_command_execution_failed: There was an error while executing this command! =(
errors.command_not_found: I don't seem to know the command '%s' :/
errors.channel_not_found: This channel does not exist on this server. Did you spell it correctly?
errors.not_a_number: That was not a number! You didn't fail, but I didn't count that.
errors.invalid_arithmetic: That was not a valid arithmetic expression! You didn't fail, but I didn't count that.
errors.same_user: You can't count twice in a row. Wait for someone else to count.
errors.no_top_stats: There are no stats yet. Count to get on the leaderboard!
errors.cheat_mode_enabled: Stats are deactivated in cheat mode because no one can lose.

replies.bot_info_tagline: Discord Bot for counting. Allows arithmetic expressions.
replies.incorrect_number: That was not the next number! You failed! Last number was %s and the next number would have been %s. Your number was %s
replies.timeout_set: Timeout has been set to %s minutes!
replies.timeout: You received a timeout for %s minutes!
replies.cooldown_disabled: New member cooldown has been disabled!
replies.cooldown_set: New member cooldown has been set to %s minutes!
replies.cooldown: Since you are a new member, you have to wait %s minutes before you can count!
replies.timeout_factor_set: Timeout factor has been set to %s!

reset_guild.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to reset the current cound and all user stats?

cheat_mode.are_you_sure:
I accept, that this completely defeats the purpose of this bot.
Note: Stats are disabled in cheat mode. Continue?
cheat_mode.abort: No, I want to be good ðŸ˜‡
cheat_mode.success: Cheat mode has been enabled! Hope you're happy...

replies.global_top: Server "%s" is on place #%s in the global leaderboard (%s servers)!
replies.help_preamble: You can visit <https://mathjs.org/docs/index.html> to see, what expressions and syntax is possible. To check, if an expression is a valid count, you can use `/calc` to see if the result is correct.
replies.admin_help_preamble: Setup: Set the counting channel with `/set-channel`, then alternatively configure options with `/set-language`, `/toggle-arithmetic`, `/set-timeout`, `/cooldown`, `/timeout-increment` and `/silent-mode`.
